result.title: No overflows!
result.content: Hello, I have recently solved 456 B question,This is my solution in c++. What I have done is that with out bothering about input size, I have calculated (input%4). Now my doubt is : as input can be upto 10^10^5(10 power 10 power 5) there are nearly 20 cases of huge input.Why there are no integer overflows or is the situation like "there are overflows but it got accepted" ?
